Participer au projet EURAFRIQUE c’est :: Participating in the EURAFRIQUE project means: Choosing to contribute to a community and getting involved in a collective journey. Power thanks to flexible commitment formats that can be adapted to your availability in tele-volunteering. Volunteering supported by digitalization for training programs, professional integration for populations and support for local development project leaders.
Contribuer au développement économique e: Contribute to economic and social development in Africa by promoting income-generating activities, support development, education and training in the multiple challenges of the 21st century. Highlight the need for civic and solidarity actions with the establishment of a large volunteer chain to concretely support entrepreneurial development and skills projects on the African continent.

Discours parfois formatés, forums, collo: Sometimes formatted speeches, forums, symposiums and conferences on the emergence of Africa should not obscure its submerged part and its future.

PARTICIPER AU PROJET EURAFRIQUE C’EST :: PARTICIPATING IN THE EURAFRICA PROJECT MEANS:
* Rejoindre la grande chaîne de la solid: * Join the great chain of international solidarity to help, monitor and coordinate social and entrepreneurial initiatives in areas presenting a vital challenge for the sustainable development of the African continent.
* Promouvoir un système éducatif et de f: * Promote an education and training system for self-employment and crafts, valuing natural resources and renewable energies.
* Lutter contre la pollution terrestre e: * Fight against terrestrial and marine pollution. Avoid serious consequences on water resources.
* Protéger les écosystèmes des rejets de: * Protect ecosystems from all types of waste and especially plastic waste
Renforcer les activités et les capacités: Strengthen the activities and capacities of agricultural entrepreneurs, especially among young people and women, within autonomous and professionalized organizations. To move from subsistence agriculture to a productivity activity.
Fédérer des initiatives, des idées et de: Bringing together initiatives, ideas and participatory reflections for social and solidarity enterprises.
Donner du temps n’est pas perdre son tem: Giving time is not wasting time. Availability to join our community in volunteering supported by digitalization.
